item.title: CVE-2023-6252|2023-11-22T13:45:10.950Z -- chameleon%20power -- chameleon%20power
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Chalemelon Power framework, affecting the getImage parameter. This vulnerability could allow a remote user to read files located on the server and gain access to sensitive information such as configuration files.
